environment_overview:
1) The detected devices include a c2c-switch and two meross Light Strips. The c2c-switch is capable of switching on and off, while the meross Light Strips have additional capabilities such as adjusting switch levels, color temperature, and color control. The first Light Strip (ID: 22e11820-64fa-4bed-ad8f-f98ef66de298) is likely located in a space where adjustable lighting is needed, while the second Light Strip (ID: 363f714d-e4fe-4052-a78c-f8c97542e709) may serve a similar purpose in a different area.

2) The current state of the c2c-switch is off, indicating it is not consuming power. The first meross Light Strip is set to a switch level of 70, meaning it is currently on and providing light, while the second Light Strip is at a switch level of 48, also indicating it is on. Actionable controls include turning off the c2c-switch, and for the Light Strips, the switch levels can be adjusted or they can be turned off entirely to comply with the user command to deactivate non-essential devices.
